title: 求ess基础插件的丢弃物品权限
author: 李嗷嗷
txt_content: 我记得有个权限，下了以后玩家不能丢弃物品，求此权限_(:з」∠)_

replies.author: prozhong
replies.txt_content: essentials.build.drop.<id>[:datavalue]        Allows dropping of an item.

replies.author: 枫色天国
replies.txt_content:
essentials.build.destroy.*     破坏
essentials.build.drop.*         丢弃
essentials.build.interact.*     交互
essentials.build.pickup.*       捡拾
essentials.build.place.*         放置
essentials.build.use.*           使用

replies.author: 李嗷嗷
replies.txt_content:
枫色天国 发表于 2015-7-7 12:03
essentials.build.destroy.*     破坏
essentials.build.drop.*         丢弃
essentials.build.interact.* ...
我给玩家下了丢弃的权限他们还可以丢弃，怎么回事
